overview: Oleg is an entrepreneur who has started his career on the technical side of IT projects. First, he was involved in the development of a hotel/restaurant information system East Concept as a programmer. Later he joined Diamedx, where he has led the web-based information system from an idea to implementation and roll-out to clients. As the product evolved, Olegâ€™s scope of responsibilities was expanding from strictly technical to project management and coaching of an agile team. Oleg has got a Bachelor of Arts degree in Information Technology from York University and a Master of Business Administration from Schulich School of Business. Oleg has also received Scrum Master certification and Toastmastersâ€™ Competent Communicator designation. In his free time, Oleg is serious about sailboat racing, which allows him to test oneâ€™s limits while dealing with stiff competition and tough weather conditions.
